seal you're going to lift up the edges
that are cooking with your spatula tilt
the pan and let the raw egg run
underneath which is going to kind of
create these layers of eggy goodness and
it will also cook a lot faster because
if you just let it sit there the bottom
will get too Brown by the time the egg
on the top is cooked so once it stops
kind of running once it doesn't really
have enough eggy liquid to run under I'm
